title: Facebook Wants to Be the Last Company to Return to Workplace, Says Sandberg
text: Sheryl Sandberg, Facebook Inc. chief operating officer, discusses what her company expects the economy will look like and when its employees will go back to work. She speaks on "Bloomberg Technology."

title: Facebook Put On Notice it Could Face More Regulation in Europe
text: During a debate between Facebook's CEO and EU Commissioner Thierry Breton, Breton warned Facebook has to do more to stop the flow of misinformation.

title: Zuckerberg urges the West to counter China's 'dangerous' approach to internet regulation
text: The Facebook CEO said he worried about other countries looking to replicate the Chinese model, which he labeled "really dangerous."

title: Instagram chief: We didn't buy Giphy for the data
text: Adam Mosseri, the head of Facebook’s Instagram division, on Monday said that the $400 million acquisition of Giphy was not about acquiring the New York company’s user data.

title: Roger McNamee on regulating Facebook's acquisition of Giphy
text: Early Facebook investor Roger McNamee joins "Squawk Alley" to discuss Facebook's acquisition of Giphy and potential regulatory pushback.

title: Oculus surpasses $100 million in Quest content sales
text: Despite a handful of devices and years of sales, Facebook has never shared unit sales of any of their VR headsets. This Today, Oculus released a new sales figure as the company reaches the 1 year anniversary of the release of the Quest headset.

title: Facebook: Market Share Growth To Drive The Stock Higher

title: AlphaOne's Dan Niles on stocks he says will hold up after the pandemic
text: Dan Niles, founding partner at AlphaOne Capital Partners, joins "Squawk Box" to discuss which stock names he believes will be able to hold up following the pandemic despite being hurt by the coronavirus.

title: Facebook's (FB) GIPHY Buyout to Enhance User Engagement
text: Facebook's (FB) GIPHY takeover is expected to boost user engagement as its exciting library of GIFs makes conversation lively and engaging.

title: 3 Reasons to Take a Close Look at Facebook Stock on the Next Dip
text: Facebook did well last quarter, showing that ad spend will hold up. As a result, FB stock will be fine when considered over the long term.

title: Got $2,500? Here Are the Top Growth Stocks to Buy Now
text: A bear market is a great time for opportunistic long-term investors to put their money to work in fast-growing companies.

title: Facebook Acquires Giphy, Reportedly For $400M
text: Facebook Inc. (NASDAQ: FB) late Friday announced it had acquired popular graphics interchange format, or GIF, files platform Giphy.

title: Saudi Arabia On A Pandemic Bargain Hunt, Buys Shares in Facebook, Disney, Boeing, Others
text: Saudi Arabia’s sovereign wealth fund is taking advantage of the coronavirus pandemic and buying stocks worth millions in the United States companies.
